mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wx_dish_access_token ( id, weid, cropid, secret, accesstoken, expirydate, isvalid, crter, crtdate, opter, optdate, deleted ) VALUES ( replace(uuid(),'-',''), #{weid}, #{cropid}, #{secret}, #{accesstoken}, #{expirydate}, 1, #{crter}, sysdate(), #{opter}, sysdate(), 0 )
mapper.select: SELECT token.id, token.weid, token.cropid, token.secret, token.accesstoken, token.expirydate, token.isvalid, token.crter, token.crtdate, token.opter, token.optdate, token.deleted FROM wx_dish_access_token token where token.deleted = 0 and token.isvalid = 1 and token.expirydate < date_add(sysdate(),INTERVAL 7200 SECOND) and token.weid = #{weid}
mapper.update: update wx_dish_access_token set isvalid = 0 where weid = #{weid}
